data.name: aboutText1
data.value: The Royal Commission's Environmental Hackathon aims to promote innovative environmental solutions and enhance sustainability practices across industries under the Royal Commission. This is achieved through collaborative problem-solving and the use of modern technologies to provide environmental solutions to existing issues

data.name: aboutText2
data.value: The hackathon presents a unique opportunity for creators and innovators from various fields to collaborate on developing effective and sustainable environmental solutions. By bringing together creative minds and diverse expertise, we aim to find new and innovative solutions to the environmental challenges faced by different industries

data.name: goalsSubText1
data.value: By encouraging participants to exchange ideas and experiences, we can achieve greater integration between different industries and realize mutual benefits

data.name: goalsSubText2
data.value: We aim to develop solutions that can be practically implemented across various industries, contributing to improved environmental performance and reducing negative environmental impact

data.name: goalsSubTitle3
data.value: Accelerating the adoption of sustainable practices.

data.name: goalsSubText3
data.value: By presenting innovative solutions, we can accelerate the adoption of sustainable practices across various industries, contributing to the achievement of long-term sustainability goals

data.name: goalsSubTitle4
data.value: Highlighting the Royal Commission's commitment to environmental preservation

data.name: goalsSubText4
data.value: By organizing this hackathon, we reaffirm the Royal Commission's commitment to supporting environmental innovation and promoting sustainable practices. This initiative highlights our dedication to fostering an environment where creative solutions can thrive and sustainability can be integrated into various industries

data.name: goalsSubTitle5
data.value: Identifying and nurturing talent in the field of environmental innovation

data.name: goalsSubTitle6
data.value: The hackathon provides an opportunity to discover and support new talents, contributing to the development of a new generation of environmental innovators. By offering a platform for creative minds to showcase their ideas and collaborate with industry experts, we aim to nurture the skills and potential of emerging talents, ultimately fostering a community dedicated to solving environmental challenges

data.name: condition1
data.value: The team leader must be of Saudi nationality.

data.name: prizeTitle
data.value: Total prize money is more than

data.name: prizeSubTitle
data.value: For winners and finalists, as well as post-hackathon training and development opportunities.

data.name: rights
data.value: All rights reserved 2024, Royal Commission for Jubail and Yanbu.
